about.title: about me
about.paragraph1: I am a <1>frontend developer</1> with experience in creating modern websites, integrating with backends, and working with non-relational databases. I enjoy exploring <1>backend development, mobile</1>, and cloud solutions. I study <1>Software Engineering</1> at UniFil and always strive to improve my skills.
about.paragraph2: I like to combine <1>technology</1> and <1>creativity</1> to build efficient solutions that solve everyday problems. I believe in the importance of <1>continuous learning</1> and collaborating with teams to deliver <1>quality products</1>.
